summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue Northwest (East Side), from West 80th Street to West 85th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12798 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
